name: Cellbry
description: Cheaper international calls with exceptional voice quality, with Cellbry, yes thats cellbry! Cellbry is great for calling India, Bangladesh, Brazil, Philippines, Mexico, China, Egypt, Germany, Nigeria, Kenya, Indonesia, Malaysia, Iran, Iraq, Morocco, Pakistan, Poland, Romania, Russia, Saudi Arabia, Sri Lanka, Nepal or any other destination. (Check our rates inside the app)  Cellbry is a high definition mobile voice application for Android, featuring functionality like Voice, in-app products and many more. This application works in 2G/3G/4G/WiFi environments. Its QoS feature ensures exceptional voice quality, bandwidth normalization, Voice/Video packet negotiation.  1. Verified mobile number. 2. Your verified mobile number will displayed to the one you call. 3. In-app purchase gives you the freedom that, you wont run out of credits anytime and anywhere. 4. No account password, just remember your mobile number, we will take care of the rest. 5. Ensuring hassle free, crystal clear voice calling experience with Cellbry.  Enjoy talking with our next generation voice experience.
